name: openrouter
author: Hens MSN <hendymms@engineer.com>
description: OpenRouter is a tool that allows you to use the OpenRouter API.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun --external='enquirer' --external='chalk' --minify
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch && bun run build
